reuters.title: GETTY PETROLEUM <GTY> SETS STOCK DIVIDEND
reuters.body: Getty Petroleum Corp said its board declared a five pct stock dividend payable on April 21 to shareholders of record April 10. The company also declared a regular cash dividend of four cts a share and reported 1986 net income rose to 17.1 mln dlrs from 11.5 mln dlrs. Reuter 
